data.title: Oconee Fall Line Technical College Accreditation
data.meta_description: Is Oconee Fall Line Technical College accredited? Find out what type of accreditation OFTC has and what it means.
data.text:
Is OFTC Accredited?

Who is giving a nod to OFTC? Read about what accreditations we found for this school.

Oconee Fall Line Technical College Is Regionally Accredited

Regional accreditation is a good thing. Attending a regionally accredited institution is important if you may want to transfer credits to another institution or if you want to attend a post-graduate program.

Accreditations Recognized by the Department of Education

Accreditations Recognized by the Council for Higher Education Accreditation
